text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Hasael bizir bar aghuir me Damaskusɨn ingariziba ini. Ezɨ 40plan kamelba da ateram. Egha ada isa kamelbagh arigha Elisa bagha ghu. A ghua otogha kamaghɨn Elisan mɨgei, “Gumazir Ekiam, Sirian Atrivim Benhadat, a nɨn otarimɨn mɨn iti, a uan arɨmariam bagh nɨn azangasa na amada, an arɨmariam gɨvagham, o puvatɨgham?”
